title: How to Learn a Module ft. Knobula Chord Pilot
description:
The unit in this video was provided by Knobula.

Get a Chord Pilot: https://bit.ly/3Y2173c
Get a Poly Cinematic: http://bit.ly/2XfaRhm

Let's learn the Knobula Chord Pilot and make some music.
